data.name: Crowd Playground
data.detailed_description:
The one and only crowd simulation game, Crowd Playground!

'Crowd Playground', a crowd world building simulation game, is coming in 2022!
Chop, burn, and electrocute the crowds of zombies with traps,
wipe out the crowds of skeletons with the zombie cannon,
and you can even enjoy a harem of beautiful women, it's all up to you.

What kind of game?

  • Build your own crowd world!
    Choose from a collection of zombies, monsters, beautiful women, cannons, various traps, decorative objects, and more!
    Other objects will be added and updated as we go!
  • Share your works and download maps created by others around the world!
  • Crowd AI can be changed! Choose from a selection of different character AIs!
    Follower, Wander, Crawl, Eating, Sit, Fear and more!
  • Player skins can be customized!
  • Playable in both FPS and TPS!
  • I have developed the game alone!
  • If you give me feedback about the game via the in-game feedback feature, the developer will be pleased!
  • Integration function with Twitch! Would anyone like to stream Crowd Playground?
  • This game really offers a unique crowd experience!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content that is not for all ages or may not be suitable for viewing at work: frequent violent and gore expressions
